name: uniwun

body.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(cwun), universe)
-| wb(wceq(cuni(cwun), universe), wal(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cwun))))
-| wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cwun))
body.pretty:
⊢ ⋃ WUni = 𝕌
⊣ (⋃ WUni = 𝕌 ↔ ∀(hs0, hs0 ∈ ⋃ WUni))
⊣ hs0 ∈ ⋃ WUni

comment: Every set is contained in a weak universe. This is the analogue of ~ grothtsk for weak universes, but it is provable in ZF without the Tarski-Grothendieck axiom, contrary to ~ grothtsk . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
